thread.section_title: American Frame americanframe.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Frame americanframe.com | www.americanframe.com
thread.title: William R. Horne
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by William R. Horne

author: William R. Horne
title: William R. Horne
text: Ordering was easy yet I had a question so I called, the lady that answered was extremely helpful and made sure that my order was correct before I placed it. It arrived quickly and I was amazed at the quality! All of the corner miters were perfectly flush, no gaps, no unevenness. It was very tight and sturdy. The packaging was excellent, they must have thought of all the ways the shipper could damage something. All of the hardware needed was included, I am extremely happy with my purchase, and the picture I framed looks great hanging above my mantle! Top notch company to deal with!!
